      • build

        public Cds build()

      • buySellProtection

        public Cds.Builder buySellProtection(BuySell buySellProtection)
        Sets whether the CDS is buy or sell.

        A value of 'Buy' implies that the fee leg payments are being paid, and protection is being bought. A value of 'Sell' implies that the fee leg payments are being received, and protection is being sold.

        Parameters:
        buySellProtection - the new value, not null
        Returns:
        this, for chaining, not null

      • startDate

        public Cds.Builder startDate(LocalDate startDate)
        Sets the first date of the term of the trade.

        This day may be subject to adjustment in accordance with a business day convention. This is typically the previous CDS date (quarter on 20th) before the trade date, adjusted.

        ISDA 2003 Term: Effective Date.

        Parameters:
        startDate - the new value, not null
        Returns:
        this, for chaining, not null

      • endDate

        public Cds.Builder endDate(LocalDate endDate)
        Sets the scheduled date on which the credit protection will lapse.

        This day may be subject to adjustment in accordance with a business day convention. This is typically an unadjusted CDS date.

        ISDA 2003 Term: Scheduled Termination Date.

        Parameters:
        endDate - the new value, not null
        Returns:
        this, for chaining, not null

      • businessDayAdjustment

        public Cds.Builder businessDayAdjustment(BusinessDayAdjustment businessDayAdjustment)
        Sets the business day adjustment to apply to the start and end dates.

        ISDA 2003 Terms: Business Day and Business Day Convention.

        Parameters:
        businessDayAdjustment - the new value, not null
        Returns:
        this, for chaining, not null

      • referenceInformation

        public Cds.Builder referenceInformation(ReferenceInformation referenceInformation)
        Sets the reference against which protection applies.

        For a single-name CDS, this contains information on the entity/issue For a CDS index, this contains information about the index.

        Parameters:
        referenceInformation - the new value, not null
        Returns:
        this, for chaining, not null

      • feeLeg

        public Cds.Builder feeLeg(FeeLeg feeLeg)
        Sets the fee leg.

        This contains all the terms relevant to defining the fixed amounts/payments per the applicable ISDA definitions.

        Parameters:
        feeLeg - the new value, not null
        Returns:
        this, for chaining, not null

        Parameters:
